segments.text: What a scene this is; it’s almost like a painting come to life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman so focused on her task, her world so limited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet behind her, turmoil is brewing, led by her own children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s daring act to reach for cookies is both hilarious and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks dangerously tipsy, and my stomach churns at the thought of him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager hand waiting gives the scene a whimsical tone, but it feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can’t she see all of this? Why can’t I warn them?
segments.speaker: PAR
